mapper.insert: insert into db_enmity (SEQUENCEID, SHOPNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', CORPID, EBAYITEMID, USERNAME, USERNEME, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userneme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_enmity set SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNEME = #{userneme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SHOPNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', CORPID, EBAYITEMID, USERNAME, USERNEME, DESCR from db_enmity where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, SHOPNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, 'STATUS', CORPID, EBAYITEMID, USERNAME, USERNEME, DESCR from db_enmity
